page.title.home: TxtWizard | Free Online Tools - Encryption, Hashing, Compression, Ethereum Key Generation
page.description.home: TxtWizard offers free online tools for text encryption, decryption, hashing, compression, Ethereum key generation, and more.
txtwizard-intro: TxtWizard is your go-to platform for free, powerful, and secure online tools. Everything runs entirely within your browser. Explore our features below:
encryption-intro: Easily encrypt sensitive data using AES-GCM or AES-CBC.
decryption-intro: Decrypt AES-encrypted data back to its original
hashing-intro: Generate cryptographic hashes like MD5, SHA1, SHA256, etc.
compression-intro: Compress text using Gzip, Bzip2, Deflate.
keygen-intro: Generate Bitcoin and Ethereum key pairs directly in your browser.
encoding-intro: Convert between Base64, Hex, URL, and HTML encoding formats.

markdown_preview.page_description: Preview your markdown text in real time.
